title: As a user I do not want to see Action Buttons on the waiver screen if I do not have permission to use them
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a club or BOC user with READ-ONLY permissions for waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to waivers screen
custom_expected: THEN these users with read-only permission should not see any action buttons as BOC or Club

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to Approve/Reject a Waiver Claim Assignment from the Approvals Clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND user has navigated to Approvals Clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN user checks the checkbox for a submitted Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable the Approve and Reject buttons on the Approvals widget
AND clicking Approve or Reject should run the requisite rules and perform the regular On Approve or On Reject updates

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Notice of Disposition for players on a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Waivers print permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a Waiver Claim Assignment tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Print" button for each player that has been added to a waiver claim assignment
AND clicking the Print button for the original player should print the NOD for a waiver claim assignment
AND clicking the Print button for any players added to the WCA should print the NOD for an Outright Trade

title: As a user I want to be able to print an Assignment Agreement for a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Waivers print permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a Waiver Claim Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Print" button at the bottom of a Waiver Claim Assignment. 
AND clicking this should allow the user to choose to print an Assignment Agreement
AND selecting Assignment Agreement should print the assignment agreement for the waiver claim assignment

title: UAT Feedback - Remove Closed Period System Dates and associated Rules
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to view and edit System Dates screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to System Dates screen
custom_expected:
THEN "Closed Period" system dates should be removed from the System Dates screen
AND Rule 2.32 should be no longer fire
AND Rule 2.09 should be amended to remove the check that these dates are populated for the current year

title: UAT Feedback - Update the logic around displaying outright trade vs. waiver claim assignment for those players that are added to a WCA
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_steps: WHEN the WCA reaches a Submitted to Club, Submitted to BOC, or Approved State
custom_expected:
THEN any player added to a waiver claim assignment that is not the player that was actually claimed, should  have outright trade in their history
AND transaction Bulletin entries for additional pro players should also display as an Outright Trade instead of a waiver claim assignment
BUT the original player should continue to display as having a waiver claim assignment

title: UAT Feedback - Waiver Claim Assignment rules updates for UR Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club user
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Claim Assignment tx for a player with claimed UR waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Claim Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN club users should not have an edit button 
AND the $1 Cash Consideration should be uneditable and not able to be removed
AND no additional considerations should be able to be added
AND the rule about cash considerations needing to be $20,000 or having a player should not fire 
BUT BOC users should continue to be able to edit the tx in any state

title: UAT Feedback - Waiver Claim Assignment rules updates for OR Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club user
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Claim Assignment tx for a player with claimed OR waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Claim Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN club users should not have an edit button 
AND the Cash Consideration should be uneditable and not able to be removed
AND no additional considerations should be able to be added
AND the rule about cash considerations needing to be $50,000 or having a player should not fire 
BUT BOC users should continue to be able to edit the tx in any state

title: UAT Feedback - Waiver Claim Assignment rules updates for TRD Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club user
AND user is attempting to create a Waiver Claim Assignment tx for a player with claimed TRD waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Claim Assignment tx
custom_expected:
THEN club users should have an edit button 
AND the default Cash Consideration should be updated to $50,000
AND any additional considerations should be able to be added
AND the rule about cash considerations needing to be $50,000 should fire
AND the error messgae for this rule should be upduated to state that we need either $50,000 or another consideration (doesn't need to be a player)
AND the original player and 2 Orgs MUST be included
AND BOC users should continue to be able to edit the tx in any state

title: BOC IT user wants to be able to change the default start time for the nightly batch process
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Batch Admin permissions
AND user has navigated to the Admin subsection of the Batches screen
AND "Default Start Time" is set to the time that the nightly batch process is scheduled to kick off
custom_expected: THEN system should change what the default start time is for the batches.

title: As BOC IT I want confirmation that my changes to the default start time of nightly batches were saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC admin
AND user has navigated to the Admin subsection of the batches screen
AND user has clicked edit in the Nightly Notifications section
AND user has made a change to the Nightly notification batch default start time via the timepicker
custom_expected: THEN system should trigger a successful save notification(blue)

title: As a user I no longer want to see OPT as an option for new waiver requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as Club or BOC
AND user is attempting to requests waivers on a player
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to waivers request entry and selects a player
custom_expected:
THEN OPT should no longer be an option in the Type dropdown 
BUT historical OPT waiver requests and claims should continue to display without issue

title: As a user I no longer want to see Optional Waivers system dates
custom_preconds: GIVEN OPT waivers are no longer able to be requested due to the new CBA
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to System Dates screen
custom_expected:
THEN the "Optional Assignment Waivers" system dates should be removed from the System Dates screen for years 2017 and on
BUT historical dates should remain
AND Rule 2.09 should be amended to remove the check that these dates are populated for the current year
